Class HoverMenu

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      HoverMenu

public class HoverMenu
extends greenfoot.Actor

A menu that pops up displaying information about the
item you are hovering over.
created when mouse is over object for 1 second.

Author:
James Lu && Terence Lai
